Enumeration Type Documentation

enum Ogre::FontType
 

Enumerates the types of Font usable in the engine.

Enumeration values:
FT_TRUETYPE  Generated from a truetype (.ttf) font.
FT_IMAGE  Loaded from an image created by an artist.
